name: lambda-live-debugger
description: Debug Lambda functions locally like it is running in the cloud

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && cp src/nodeWorkerRunner.mjs dist && cp src/frameworks/cdkFrameworkWorker.mjs dist/frameworks && node fix-imports.js && npm run add-bang && npm run bundle-extension
scripts.bundle-extension: cd src/extension && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.deploy-github-role: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name lld-deploy-role --template-file cloudformation/gitHubDeployRole.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --profile lldebugger
scripts.test: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run
scripts.test-cdk-basic: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/cdk-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-cdk-basic-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/cdk-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-cdk-esm: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/cdk-esm.test.ts
scripts.test-cdk-esm-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/cdk-esm.test.ts
scripts.test-sls-basic: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/sls-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-sls-basic-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/sls-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-sls-esbuild-cjs: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/sls-esbuild-cjs.test.ts
scripts.test-sls-esbuild-cjs-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/sls-esbuild-cjs.test.ts
scripts.test-sls-esbuild-esm: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/sls-esbuild-esm.test.ts
scripts.test-sls-esbuild-esm-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/sls-esbuild-esm.test.ts
scripts.test-osls-basic: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/osls-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-osls-basic-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/osls-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-osls-esbuild-cjs: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/osls-esbuild-cjs.test.ts
scripts.test-osls-esbuild-cjs-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/osls-esbuild-cjs.test.ts
scripts.test-osls-esbuild-esm: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/osls-esbuild-esm.test.ts
scripts.test-osls-esbuild-esm-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/osls-esbuild-esm.test.ts
scripts.test-sam-basic: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/sam-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-sam-basic-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/sam-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-sam-alt: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/sam-alt.test.ts
scripts.test-sam-alt-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/sam-alt.test.ts
scripts.test-terraform-basic: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true vitest run test/terraform-basic.test.ts
scripts.test-terraform-basic-observable: npm run build && RUN_TEST_FROM_CLI=true OBSERVABLE_MODE=true vitest run test/terraform-basic.test.ts
